漸凍人症.definition: amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), aka motor neurone disease (MND)

漸弱.definition: to fade out; gradually weakening; diminuendo; decrescendo

漸快.definition: to speed up gradually; faster and faster; (music) accelerando

漸慢.definition: to slow down gradually; slower and slower; (music) decelerando; ritardando

漸稀.definition: to thin out gradually; to become fainter and fainter

漸行漸遠.definition: gradually proceed, gradually get further apart

漸趨.definition: to become more and more; to gradually become

漸進.definition: progress step by step; gradual progress; to move forward (slowly)
